author: timesunion.com
title: Rodger's Quick Take
text: My preseason prediction that the Giants would finish 11-5 is looking a little better. They came through with a dominating performance at Buffalo on Sunday and they were locked in from the start, especially on defense. Give the game ball to defensive coordinator Steve Spagnuolo , whose unit is overachieving. Bottom line: The Giants could be 4-0, but instead are 2-2 and making major strides on both sides of the ball. There's a long way to go, but this team is starting to resemble the one I thought could make a deep run in the postseason. NewsChannel 13's Rodger Wyland can be heard weekdays from 9 a.m. to noon on WOFX 980 AM.
